mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_TITLE, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, P.PRODUCT_TRADE_ADR1, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, W.WISHLIST_ID, W.PRODUCT_ID, W.MEM_ID, -- 로그인한 ID P.PRODUCT_ID, P.MEM_ID AS SELLER_ID, -- 판매자 ID (PRODUCT) M.MEM_NICK AS SELLER_NICKNAME -- 판매자 닉네임 (MEMBER) FROM WISHLIST W JOIN PRODUCT P ON W.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID -- PRODUCT 테이블의 MEM_ID는 판매자 WHERE W.MEM_ID = #{id};
